items.text:
Great.
Consider using requestLocationUpdates(LocationRequest locationRequest, PendingIntent intent).
It may be better for the batter live and performance for your users.
Corresponding method from GMS: https://developers.google.com/android/reference/com/google/android/gms/location/FusedLocationProviderApi.html#requestLocationUpdates(com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient, com.google.android.gms.location.LocationRequest, android.app.PendingIntent)
items.href: Use GPS in background service · Issue #158 · mcharmas/Android-ReactiveLocation

items.text: Consider using requestLocationUpdates(LocationRequest locationRequest, PendingIntent intent).
